activities.name: On fail
activities.description: This activity will run on failure of Copy data1 activity.

activities.name: On success
activities.description: This activity will run on successful completion of Copy data1 activity. Then On fail activity is skipped then On skip activity will run. Because in this case On fail activity is not getting called.

activities.name: On completion
activities.description: This activity will run on success/Failure of Copy data1 activity. It does not care success or failure, if the copy data1 completes then automatically copydata4 will run.

activities.name: On skip
activities.description: This activtiy get called when the On fail activity is not getting called after the Copy data1. This happens when Copy data1 runs successfully then On fail activity will be skipped and On success activity get called and then On skip activtiy called after On sucsess.
